titles.title: A bill to modify the wheat provisions of the Agricultural Act of 1949 by eliminating the Secretary of Agriculture's authority to restrict haying and grazing on idled wheat acreage.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 2/4/1988--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to repeal the Secretary of Agriculture's authority to restrict haying and grazing on idled wheat acreage.
